alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Deuel, southeastern Grant and east central Codington Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 945 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waverly, or 12 miles northeast of Watertown, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Troy around 950 PM CDT. Stockholm and Strandburg around 1000 PM CDT. La Bolt around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Albee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
